definition: A rotating tool used for shaping, sharpening, or smoothing various materials, typically made of abrasive material and mounted on a machine. It is commonly employed in metalworking, woodworking, and other related industries.

examples.english: The grinding wheel is worn out.
I need a new grinding wheel.
The grinding wheel is spinning fast.
The grinding wheel is made of silicon carbide.

examples.german: Die Schleifscheibe hat einen Durchmesser von 150 mm.
examples.english: The grinding wheel has a diameter of 150 mm.
